headline: Mohawk Industries (MHK): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q4 Earnings?
summary: Mohawk Industries’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 27.9% of its value and falling to $115 per share. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
